title: Where can I register to participate in SEI'24?
description: You can participate in this edition by registering through the link below.

title: I am not a student, can I attend the event?
description: Yes! SEI is open to all the community. Everyone can register and participate in our talks and most contests. Please check our general regulation to know in which contests you can qualify for prizes.

title: How can I contact the SEI team?
description: You can e-mail us to geral@seium.org or leave a message on our social media accounts.
